channel.title: Shard Revolution Run help!
channel.description:
Ok ive been using shard revolution and i just bought my vps from vpsland but they canceled my order. cuz they suck ass anyways i was buying a vps so i didnt have to portforward my router but now i have to and i found out how.. but i cant seem to find where to change the ip in shard revolution to put my server online.
Basically i need help with learning where to change the ip in the server files of shard revolution files.

item.title: Shard Revolution Run help!

where do i change it? Pllease help lol just tell me where bro

Read full topic
